pkgmetadata.longdescription: Blind Source Separation for Multivariate Spatial Data // Blind source separation for multivariate spatial data based on simultaneous/joint diagonalization of local covariance matrices. This package is an implementation of the methods described in Bachoc, Genton, Nordhausen, Ruiz-Gazen and Virta (2020) doi:10.1093/biomet/asz079.
